auth.newUniquePassword: New password cant be same as the old password.
auth.otpTimeout: You should wait {remainingTime}s to try again.

user.userExists: User with this mobile number already exists.
user.cantChangeRole: You cant change this user role.
user.paymentRequired: The requested transaction exceeds your available balance. Please add {value} funds to your account.
user.alreadyVerified: Your account is already verified or requested to get verified.
user.sameMobileNumber: New mobile number cant be same as the old mobile number.
user.firstLevelVerifyRequired: You must first complete the first step of the authentication process.
user.docImageIsNotValid: The submitted document is not acceptable.
user.isNotActive: This user has been deactivated by the admin. For more information, please contact support.

transaction.lessThanMinTradeableAmount: The requested amount must be more than {value}.
transaction.cantChangeStatus: Cannot change transaction status to requested one.
transaction.lessThanTradeLimit: Based on your user level restrictions, your transaction must be greater than {value}.
transaction.moreThanTradeLimit: Based on your user level restrictions, your transaction must be less than {value}.
transaction.reportTimeConflict: The end date must be after the start date.
transaction.payLaterLimit: Your margin transactions have exceeded the allowed limit. To continue, please settle your previous transactions first.
transaction.moreThanMaxDecimalPlaces: The number of decimal places must be less than or equal to {value}.
transaction.notPaidYet: The amount for this transaction has not yet been paid by the user.
transaction.priceCannotBeEmpty: The price field cannot be empty.
transaction.fixedPriceTransactionsAreNotAllowed: Fixed price transactions are not allowed.
transaction.priceMismatch: The price has changed, please try again.
transaction.payLaterBuyNotAllowed: Pay later buy is not allowed.

product.emptyMinDeliverableAmount: The minDeliverableAmount field cannot be empty.
product.cantDelete: Your request is not possible. A product request has been registered for this product.
product.outOfStock: Sorry, the requested quantity exceeds the available stock. Please reduce the requested quantity or contact support.
product.cantDeleteGroup: Your request is not possible. This group has at least one product, remove them first please.
product.alreadyHasAGroup: Your request is not possible. This product already is in another group.

productRequest.lessThanMinDeliverable: The requested amount must be more than {value}.
productRequest.cantChangeStatus: Cannot change product request status to requested one.
productRequest.moreThanMaxDecimalPlaces: The number of decimal places must be less than or equal to {value}.

balanceTransaction.lessThanMinDepositAmount: The requested deposit amount must not less than {value}.
balanceTransaction.lessThanMinWithdrawAmount: The requested withdraw amount must not less than {value}.

externalApis.blackListed: The inquiry of this card is not possible.
externalApis.ownerNotAuthorized: Card owner identity is not valid.
externalApis.naCodeAndCardNotMatch: The national code does not match the card number.
externalApis.naCodeAndMobileNotMatch: The national code does not match the mobile number.
externalApis.nationalCodeBlackListed: Inquiry for this national code is not possible.

settings.timeConflict: Time conflict in rule {ruleNumber}. start time must be less than end time.

discount.used: The discount code has already been used.
discount.notValidForProduct: The discount is not valid for this product.

level.cannotDelete: Your request is not possible. At least one user with this level exists in the system.

withdrawLimit.moreThanLimit: Your withdrawal amount in this time period exceeds the allowed limit.
withdrawLimit.timeConflict: start time must be less than end time.

tradeLimit.moreThanLimit: Your transaction amount in this time period exceeds the allowed limit.
tradeLimit.timeConflict: start time must be less than end time.
tradeLimit.timeDifference: The start time and end time must have no more than 24h difference.

tradeable.cantDelete: Your request is not possible. A product or transaction has been registered for this tradable.
tradeable.badPriceApi: The provided values for retrieving the price did not result in a valid number.
tradeable.notEnoughUserInventory: The requested transaction exceeds available user inventory.
tradeable.outOfStock: Sorry, the requested quantity exceeds the available stock. Please reduce the requested quantity or contact support.

orderBook.priceCannotBeEmpty: The price field cannot be empty.
orderBook.amountCannotBeEmpty: The amount field cannot be empty.
orderBook.totalCannotBeEmpty: The total field cannot be empty.
orderBook.orderingDisabled: Order placement is disabled for you.

giftCard.cantChangeStatus: Cannot change gift card status to requested one.
giftCard.used: The gift card has already been used.
giftCard.lessThanMinWeight: The requested amount must be a multiple of {value}.
giftCard.cannotDelete: Only pending gift cards can be deleted.
giftCard.invalidWeight: Acceptable values must be one of the following: [{value}].

branch.cantDelete: Your request is not possible. A time slot has already been scheduled for this branch.
branch.cantDeleteBranchTime: Your request is not possible. A request for physical delivery has been scheduled for this time.
branch.branchTimeHasNoCapacity: The selected time slot for the branch is full. Please choose another time.
branch.branchTimeTimeConflict: start time must be less than end time.

transfer.moreThanMaxDecimalPlaces: The number of decimal places must be less than or equal to {value}.
transfer.cantChangeStatus: The transfer status cannot be changed.

stake.planNotActive: This stake plan is not active.
stake.planHasStakes: This stake plan has stakes and cannot be deleted.
